1.Relational Algebra

1.1 PPT

1.1.1 selection

It means SELECT something from table_a where satisfy the conditionA.

1.1.2 projection

It means SELECT COLUMNS from table_a .

1.1.2 Intersection

table_a and table_b must have same columns and in same order. Intersection is to pick out the same tuples both in table_a and table_b.

1.1.3 Join

table_a and table_b must have same columns and in same order. Intersection is to pick out the same tuples both in table_a and table_b.

1.1.4 Division
